question: Many people today are worried about cyber crime such as hacking and identity theft. What problems does cyber crime cause andd what solutions can you suggest for ordinary people and business to take?
text: Nowadays, the incident of  internet fraud  is becoming alarming and this calls for concern by the residents. Oftentimes the action leads to  financial loss and the death of victims. However,  entrepreneurs and individuals need to take proactive steps such as installing   anti-spyware on their gadgets and improving  self-awareness. Thus, the essay will further explain with specific examples the effects and solutions to the menace in the subsequent paragraphs.

One of the first complications is the failure of investment by defrauding citizens and financial institutions.  For instance, it has been reported by the Financial Times that 20% of start-up loans for small enterprises were lost to people of the underworld  during an online business engagement. In addition,  it has resulted in the collapse of firms.  Secondly,  another issue that needs to be considered is the termination  of victims' life after being swindled. For example, most  individuals sometimes experience trauma post financial catastrophe and  account for the poor mental health of the casualties and in the long make the victim  commit suicide.

Subsequently,   a possible solution to the issue is for the commerce entity to incorporate anti-theft software on their computers.  For instance,  anti-virus like Avast and others are capable of preventing  details pilfering  by  fraudsters. This will deter the antics of the perpetrators. Moreover ,  another way of resolving the situation  is for ordinary people  to browse reliable websites for activities . For example, users should be on the lookout for  suspicious web dealings , self-awareness will make them  fortify themselves against being cheated by  fraudsters and they can do so by limiting commercial deals to secured channels.

Lastly, internet criminals have been a pain in the neck to citizens and their jobs. While  it has led to a deficit of capital and life of their victims.Henceforth, people should use appropriate protective  software applications and increase awareness about online activities.
